mapper.select: select visit_count from chart where to_char(time, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')

select floor(avg(visit_count)) from chart where TO_NUMBER(to_char(time, 'yymmdd'), '99999999') BETWEEN (select TO_NUMBER(to_char(sysdate - 6, 'yymmdd'), '99999999') from dual) and (select TO_NUMBER(to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd'), '99999999') from dual)

select floor(avg(visit_count)) from chart where TO_NUMBER(to_char(time, 'yymmdd'), '99999999') BETWEEN (select TO_NUMBER(to_char(sysdate - 29, 'yymmdd'), '99999999') from dual) and (select TO_NUMBER(to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd'), '99999999') from dual)
SELECT floor(avg(visit_count)) FROM chart WHERE time BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{value}+1)+1) - TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD') AND TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{value}+1)+1)) +0.99999421
SELECT sum(pay_amount) FROM chart WHERE time BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{value}+1)+1) - TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD') AND TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{value}+1)+1)) +0.99999421

SELECT to_char(time, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(time, 'mm') || '월' FROM chart WHERE time BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{value}+1)+1) - TO_CHAR(sysdate,'DD') AND TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-#{value}+1)+1)) +0.99999421 GROUP BY to_char(time, 'yy') || '년 ' || to_char(time, 'mm') || '월'
mapper.update: update chart set pay_amount = pay_amount + #{value} where to_char(time, 'yy/mm/dd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
